cctools Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
batch_job_infoDescribes a batch job when it has completed
chirp_auditDescibes the space consumed by a single user on a Chirp server
chirp_bulkioDescribes a bulk I/O operation
chirp_direntDescribes a directory entry returned by chirp_reli_readdir
chirp_job_stateDescribes the current state of an active storage job on a Chirp server
chirp_statDescribes the properties of a file, much like the Unix stat structure
chirp_statfsDescribes the properties of a file system, much like the Unix statfs structure
process_infoDescribes a completed process
work_queue_statsStatistics describing a work queue
work_queue_taskA task description
